overview: In this trio of edgy tales, Eugene spends his energy and inheritance on trying out new ways of having sex; a young brother and sister pop prescription pills as if they were candy; and a grieving father torments a weapon manufacturer's family. This highly suspenseful and provocative set of stories from writer-director Adrian Selkowitz also features Jim Storm, Alec Clawson, Katie Kocis, Drew Watson and Kelly Costa.
title: Sex Drugs Guns
